thread.title: Win a Benefit beauty kit
thread.title_full: Win a Benefit beauty kit - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a Benefit beauty kit
text: We’ve teamed up with Benefit to give away 3 of its brilliant beauty kits, worth £28.50 each. By entering the competition, you have the chance to win one of the following kits: 1. Do the Hoola – includes: Hoola bronzing powder, Ultra Plush lip gloss mini in Hoola, They’re Real mascara mini, Benebalm mini and Dew the Hoola (New liquid bronze) 2. Operation: Pore-Proof – includes: Porefessional mini, Agent Zero Shine mini, License to blot mini and Dr Feel Good, Shy Beam (new matte highlighter) 3. Sexy on the Run – includes: They’re Real mascara black mini, They’re Real mascara brown mini, They’re Real push up liner black mini and They’re Real remover mini Entry is free. Competition closes Wednesday, August 5, 2015. Read full terms and conditions In assocciation with: Online Form - Win a Benefit beauty kit telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
